items.label: Contains Austrian passport format/layout
items.description: Document shows red cover, Austrian coat of arms, and standard passport design

items.label: Has readable passport number
items.description: Passport number is visible and in correct format (alphanumeric, typically 8-9 characters)

items.label: Contains clear photo of passport holder
items.description: Document includes a clear, identifiable photograph of the passport holder

items.label: Shows expiration date in valid format
items.description: Expiration date is present and in valid date format (DD.MM.YYYY or similar)

items.label: Contains personal information
items.description: Document includes required personal information: name, date of birth, nationality

items.label: Has Austrian ID-card format
items.description: Document shows credit-card size format with Austrian design elements

items.label: Contains readable ID number
items.description: ID number is visible and in correct format for Austrian ID card

items.label: Contains personal information
items.description: Document includes required personal information: name, date of birth, nationality

items.label: Shows expiration and issue dates in valid format
items.description: Expiration date and issue date are present and in valid date format (DD.MM.YYYY or similar)

items.label: Contains buyer information
items.description: Document includes buyer's name, address, or company details

items.label: Contains seller information
items.description: Document includes seller's name, address, or company details

items.label: Has property address or object description
items.description: Document contains property address or clear description of the real estate object

items.label: Contains purchase price
items.description: Purchase price is clearly stated as a numeric value

items.label: Includes contract date and/or notary information
items.description: Document contains contract date and/or notary name/information
